doc.title: Invasion of the Buddy Snatcher: Bad Dad
doc.plot: 'Invasion of the Buddy Snatcher' is comedy exploring the unique dilemmas of suburban Dads. Bad Dad struggles to balance the demands of his many identities: father, husband, friend and middle-aged inner child. Come and meet Bad Dad, Prowler Dad, Mad Dad, Vlad Dad and the newest member of their clique, New Dad, as they navigate this world a few streets over from your own.
